title: Idea for the client
body:
You guys should have a link generator in the lobby when putting a group of friends together - allowing for people to click it and login with single sign on (FB Auth linked to main account) then automatically jump into the lobby.

Idea is Open Facebook Messenger
Copy generated lobby link into it
Friend clicks it
Friend Automagically signs into client
Friend Automagically appears in lobby.

A modified idea (for security reasons)
Friend clicks link
Friend puts password in quickly
Friend Automagically signs into client
Friend Automagically appears in lobby

You could also on the password screen have a decline button.


Just a thought
